org.dspace.content.service

Interface MetadataValueService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetadataValueServiceImpl

    public interface MetadataValueService
    Service interface class for the MetadataValue object. The implementation of this class is responsible for all business logic calls for the MetadataValue object and is autowired by spring
    Author:
    kevinvandevelde at atmire.com

                                MetadataField metadataField)
                         throws IOException,
                                SQLException
        Retrieves the metadata values for a given field from the database.
        Parameters:
        context - dspace context
        metadataField - metadata field whose values to look for
        Returns:
        a collection of metadata values
        Throws:
        IOException - if IO error
        SQLException - if database error
